pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pyaaiscPython AAindex database scrape### About`pyaaisc` scrapes data from AAindex website https://www.genome.jp/aaindex/. Currently supported operations:* search by `keyword` and `dbkey`* get full list of indices by `dbkey`* get a single record by `accession_number` and `dbkey`### Instalation```pip install pyaaisc```### Usage```pythonfrom pyaaisc import Aaindexaaindex = Aaindex()for result in aaindex.search('charge'): print(result)full_list = aaindex.get_all(dbkey='aaindex1')record = aaindex.get('KLEP840101')title = record.titleindex_data = record.index_data```
